QuestData.Title: Look To The Stars
QuestData.Description: My gnomish friend, Cog, has promised to help me build a device which will let me peer towards the stars. According to Cog's blueprint, what I need first is a way to reflect light.$B$BI remember a woman by the name of Mary who became well known around these parts for always carrying a looking glass. Perhaps you can track Mary down and see if she might lend us a reflective surface for this project? I believe she once resided in southern Duskwood. . .
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Mary and persuade her to give up a reflective surface for Viktori's project.
QuestData.RewardText: Why yes, I used to own a looking glass.
